file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 32-50-01-04 - STEERING HANDLE WHEEL - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL STEERING HANDLE WHEEL - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the steering handle wheel. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 32-50-01-000-801-A STEERING HANDLE WHEEL - REMOVAL STEERING HANDLE WHEEL - INSTALLA- ALL 32-50-01-400-801-A TION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 32-50-01 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 32-50-01-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. STEERING HANDLE WHEEL - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the steering handle wheel. B. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 223 223FLW Cockpit, LH side C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task In the cockpit H. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Move the pilot seat fully rearward. (2) On the circuit breaker panel, open the STEER circuit breaker and attach a DO-NOT- CLOSE tag to it. (3) Open the panel access (5) under the panel 223FLW. I. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the screws (1) and washers (2). (2) Disconnect the electrical connector J7005 (4). (3) Lift and remove the steering handle wheel (3). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 32-50-01 Page 2 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Steering Handle Wheel - Removal/Installation Figure 401 ZONE 223 A B DET. A 5. PANEL ACCESS 1. SCREW (4) 2. WASHER (4) 3. STEERING HANDLE WHEEL 4. ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR J7005 DET. B EM145AMM320671A.DGN EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 32-50-01 Page 3 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 32-50-01-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. STEERING HANDLE WHEEL - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the steering handle wheel. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION NOSE WHEEL STEERING SYSTEM ACTUATION - AMM TASK 32-50-00-700-803-A/500 OPERATIONAL CHECK C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 223 223FLW Cockpit, LH side D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task In the cockpit I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Install the steering handle wheel (3). (2) Install the washers (2) and screws (1). (3) Connect the electrical connector J7005 (4). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Close the panel access (5) under the panel 223FLW. (2) Put the pilot seat back to its usual position. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 32-50-01 Page 4 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (3) On the circuit breaker panel, close the STEER circuit breaker and remove the DO- NOT-CLOSE tag from it. (4) Do the operational check of the nose wheel steering system actuation ( AMM TASK 32-50-00-700-803-A/500).
